p: In addition, some stakeholders (farmers, agricultural cooperatives, and planting companies) process the plants themselves, except when there is large economic pressure whereupon they will sell the fresh roots at low prices. Among the various models, the independent farmers in VCs 1 and 2 will carry out breeding by themselves and use their own farmland for cultivation purposes. This will help them to reduce non-labor costs, so as to save input while ensuring higher returns. Additionally, during the harvesting process, the drying and primary processing processes can all be performed by family members in order to save labor costs.
